mapper.select: SELECT A.USERNO ,A.USERNAME ,A.USERID ,A.EMAIL ,A.USERDUTY ,CHKROLE ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = 0 THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = 1 THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,ISDELETE ,CASE WHEN A.CHKAUTH = 10 THEN '일반사용자' WHEN A.CHKAUTH = 20 THEN '관리자사용자' END AS CHKAUTH_ ,CHKAUTH ,CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTERDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') = '1900-01-01' THEN '' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTERDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS ENTERDATE ,A.MOBILE1 ,A.MOBILE2 ,A.MOBILE3 ,CASE WHEN LENGTH(CONCAT(A.MOBILE1,'-',A.MOBILE2,'-',A.MOBILE3)) > 5 THEN CONCAT(A.MOBILE1,'-',A.MOBILE2,'-',A.MOBILE3) ELSE '' END AS MOBILE ,A.TELNO1 ,A.TELNO2 ,A.TELNO3 , CASE WHEN LENGTH(CONCAT(A.TELNO1,'-',A.TELNO2,'-',A.TELNO3)) > 5 THEN CONCAT(A.TELNO1,'-',A.TELNO2,'-',A.TELNO3) ELSE '' END AS TELNO ,A.USERDESC ,(SELECT SITENAME FROM ma900010 B WHERE B.SITEID = A.SITEID) AS SITENAME FROM me800010 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.USERNO = #{userno}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalRows FROM (SELECT A.ICNUM, A.HEADER, A.SUBJECT, A.CONTENT, A.LINKURL, B.USERNAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE, A.ISDELETE FROM crud_saas.ma900040 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN crud_saas.me800010 AS B ON A.REGUSER = B.USERNO WHERE A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.SITEID = #{siteid}) AS E
AND E.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND E.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{editor},'%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ICNUM, CASE A.HEADER WHEN 0 THEN '전체' WHEN 1 THEN '공지' WHEN 2 THEN '알림' WHEN 3 THEN '뉴스' END AS HEADER , A.SUBJECT, A.CONTENT, A.LINKURL, B.USERNAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE, A.ISDELETE, @RNUM:=@RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM crud_saas.ma900040 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN crud_saas.me800010 AS B ON A.REGUSER = B.USERNO,(SELECT @RNUM := 0) R WHERE A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.SITEID = #{siteid}
AND A.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND B.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{editor},'%')
order by A.ICNUM DESC ) AS result
